languages.text:
Fires 5 heavy-loaded torpedo salvos with melta warheads. Each torpedo deals 50 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 18 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Heavy-loaded torpedoes sacrifices most of onboard cohitators and fuel reserves in favor of carrying larger warhead.They can't be guided beyong initial course selection and has only 2 round lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Fires 5 heavy-loaded torpedo salvos with melta warheads. Each torpedo deals 50 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 18 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Heavy-loaded torpedoes sacrifices most of onboard cohitators and fuel reserves in favor of carrying larger warhead.They can't be guided beyong initial course selection and has only 2 round lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Tire{/g} 5 salves de torpilles lourdes équipées d'ogives à fusion. Chaque torpille inflige 80 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en cas d'impact direct et 12 points de dégâts dans une zone d'une case en cas de tir manqué et d'explosion déclenchée par une {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}.
Les torpilles lourdes sacrifient la plupart des cogitateurs embarqués et réserves de carburant au profit d'ogives plus imposantes. Elles ne peuvent pas être guidées au-delà de leur trajectoire initiale et leur durée de vie est limitée à 2 rounds.
<indent=5%>Rechargement : 1 round</indent>
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} 5 heavy-loaded torpedo salvos with melta warheads. Each torpedo deals 50 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 18 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.
Heavy-loaded torpedoes sacrifices most of onboard cohitators and fuel reserves in favor of carrying larger warhead.They can't be guided beyong initial course selection and has only 2 round lifetime.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Feuert{/g} 5 schwere Torpedos mit Melta-Gefechtsköpfen ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht mit einem direkten Treffer 50 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Fehlschüsse verursachen in einem Radius von 1 Feld 18 Schaden, da sie mittels {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g} explodieren.
Schwere Torpedos verzichten zugunsten eines größeren Gefechtskopfes auf Cohitatoren und Treibstoffreserven. Sie sind nach der Kursauswahl nicht lenkbar und werden nach 2 Runden zerstört.
<indent=5%>Nachladen: 1 Runde</indent>
